title: Orcs of Mordor
data:
In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), these [orcs](/wiki/Orc_\(monster_class\) "Orc (monster class)") appear in the lower sections of the [Mordor ruins chaos quest](/wiki/Mordor_Ruins_Quest "Mordor Ruins Quest").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Mordor orc elite](#Mordor_orc_elite)
- [2 Mordor shaman](#Mordor_shaman)
- [3 Mordor marshal](#Mordor_marshal)
- [4 High shaman](#High_shaman)

## Mordor orc elite

| o Mordor orc elite *(No tile)*                                  |                                                  |
| --------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")** | 13                                               |
| **Attacks**                                                     | Weapon 1d8 physical, Offhand Weapon 1d8 physical |
|                                                                 |                                                  |

| o Mordor orc elite *(No tile)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                       |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | 13                                                                                    |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Weapon 1d8 physical, Offhand Weapon 1d8 physical                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                       |

| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 0                                                                                     |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | -5 (chaotic)                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                       |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 0 (Not randomly generated)                                                            |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Yes                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                       |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | 1350                                                                                  |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 200                                                                                   |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | medium                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                       |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison"), [petrification](/wiki/Petrification "Petrification") |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison"), [petrification](/wiki/Petrification "Petrification") |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                       |
| A Mordor orc elite:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is an orc.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [likes gold](/wiki/Gold_lover "Gold lover").
* likes gems.
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* normally appears in large [groups](/wiki/Group "Group").
* may [turn against you](/wiki/Treachery "Treachery") when tame.
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                                       |

**Mordor orc elites** are simply higher-level [Mordor orcs](/wiki/Mordor_orc "Mordor orc").

* is an orc.

* [likes gold](/wiki/Gold_lover "Gold lover").
* likes gems.
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* may [turn against you](/wiki/Treachery "Treachery") when tame.
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                                       |

* can pick up weapons and food.

The **high shaman** serves as a mini-boss in the **Mordor Ruins quest**. He is found guarding an altar right before the last portion of the quest.

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Orcs of Mordor

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

In dNetHack, these orcs appear in the lower sections of the Mordor ruins chaos quest.

Contents

  • 1 Mordor orc elite
  • 2 Mordor shaman
  • 3 Mordor marshal
  • 4 High shaman

Mordor orc elite

o Mordor orc elite (No tile)
Difficulty 13
Attacks Weapon 1d8 physical, Offhand Weapon 1d8 physical
o Mordor orc elite (No tile)
Difficulty 13
Attacks

Weapon 1d8 physical, Offhand Weapon 1d8 physical

Base level 10
Base experience 259
Speed 12
Base AC 10
Base MR 0
Alignment -5 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1350
Nutritional value 200
Size medium
Resistances poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed poison, petrification

A Mordor orc elite:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is an orc.
  • is strong.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • normally appears in large groups.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.


Mordor orc elites are simply higher-level Mordor orcs.

Mordor shaman

o Mordor shaman (No tile)
Difficulty 15
Attacks Cast 0d0 mage spell
o Mordor shaman (No tile)
Difficulty 15
Attacks

Cast 0d0 mage spell

Base level 13
Base experience 360
Speed 9
Base AC 5
Base MR 10
Alignment -5 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1350
Nutritional value 300
Size medium
Resistances poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed poison, petrification

A Mordor shaman:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is an orc.
  • is strong.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.

Mordor marshal

o Mordor marshal (No tile)
Difficulty 16
Attacks Weapon 2d4 physical, Offhand Weapon 2d4 physical
o Mordor marshal (No tile)
Difficulty 16
Attacks

Weapon 2d4 physical, Offhand Weapon 2d4 physical

Base level 14
Base experience 395
Speed 12
Base AC 8
Base MR 0
Alignment -5 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 350
Size medium
Resistances poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed poison, petrification

A Mordor marshal:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is an orc.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • is strong.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.

High shaman

o high shaman (No tile)
Difficulty 22
Attacks Weapon 4d10 physical, Kick 1d4 physical, Cast 0d0 mage spell
o high shaman (No tile)
Difficulty 22
Attacks

Weapon 4d10 physical, Kick 1d4 physical, Cast 0d0 mage spell

Base level 18
Base experience 588
Speed 9
Base AC 5
Base MR 50
Alignment -10 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1350
Nutritional value 300
Size medium
Resistances fire, sleep, shock, poison
Resistances conveyed poison

The high shaman:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is an orc.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.

The high shaman serves as a mini-boss in the Mordor Ruins quest. He is found guarding an altar right before the last portion of the quest.

The '''high shaman''' serves as a mini-boss in the '''Mordor Ruins quest'''. He is found guarding an altar right before the last portion of the quest.
